title: On The Debate: Craig Bellamy, Liam Rosenior and Dennis Wise
description: Join us for The Debate this week as our guests tackle the big football talking points.
content:
Scott Minto will be presenting on Tuesday at the slightly later time of 10.15pm as he's joined by Liam Rosenior and Craig Bellamy, before Geoff Shreeves takes the hot-seat, with Ian Wright and Dennis Wise on Wednesday, and Tim Sherwood on Thursday.
Tuesday 9th (10.15pm)
Wednesday 10th
Thursday 11th
Friday 12th
Watch The Debate each weeknight on Sky Sports Premier League.
